messages.title: New Payment Received
messages.content: You have received a payment of $250.00 from John Doe.

messages.title: Withdraw Complete
messages.content: Your withdrawal of 0.5 BTC has been processed successfully.

messages.title: Security Alert
messages.content: New login detected from United States. If this was not you, please secure your account.

messages.title: Card Application Approved
messages.content: Your application for a Visa Gold card has been approved.

messages.title: System Maintenance
messages.content: Scheduled maintenance on April 15th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM UTC.

messages.title: Account Verification
messages.content: Your account has been successfully verified. All features are now available.
